message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand where you're coming from, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we try $160?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to go down to $140?
I'm not quite ready to go that low, Bob. But I'm willing to make another compromise. How about we try $155?
I appreciate the willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above that price. Would you be willing to go down to $145?
I'm not willing to go that low, Bob. But I'm willing to make another small concession. How about we try $152?
I'm getting close, but I still think we can do better. Would you be willing to go down to $142?
I'm not willing to go that low, Bob. But I'm willing to make one more small concession. How about we try $148?
I'm not sure I can go any lower. I'm willing to meet you at $145, but that's as low as I can go. If you're not willing to accept that, I think I'll have to look elsewhere.
